task: Approximate amount of fat burned by a 28yo, 172cm tall, 70kg woman running for 30min at a pace of 6min/mile.
Approximate amount of fat burned by a 28yo, 172cm tall, 70kg woman running for 30min at a pace of 6min/mile.
user_action_and_explanation: type "calories burned by a 28 year old 172cm 70kg woman running 30min at 6min/mile" in the search bar to find the approximate amount of fat burned.
observation: The WolframAlpha search returned the results, showing that a 28-year-old, 172 cm tall, 70 kg woman running for 30 minutes at a pace of 6 minutes per mile would burn approximately 600 calories. The estimated amount of fat burned is 0.17 pounds.

observation: This summary reflects the most recent observations only. The search on WolframAlpha determined that a 28-year-old, 172 cm tall, 70 kg woman running for 30 minutes at a pace of 6 minutes per mile burns approximately 600 calories. This results in an estimated fat loss of about 0.17 pounds. The heart rate during this activity is estimated between 142.4 to 192 bpm.
